item.description: Loren Spivak is giving a free seminar on Economics History and coalition building. This is his updated seminar and the last one he is conducting in West Mass. Though it is free, if you wish, you can order from the great menu Abruzzo's has to offer. His seminars have been well received and all highly encourage to attend. It is on 4/27 and 4/28 and starts at 6:30 both nights. More info upon request. Sponsored by the Pioneer Valley Tea Party and the Wilbraham-Hampden Tea Party (host).
item.name: The Free Market Warrior Comes to Wilbraham
